mapper.select: SELECT id, organ_id, app_id,user_name, login_name, password, status,del FROM uim_sys_user WHERE login_name =#{login}

select role.id, role.code, role.role_name, role.feature, role.sort from uim_sys_user sysuser left join uim_user_role userrole on userrole.user_id = sysuser.id left join uim_role role on role.id = userrole.role_id where sysuser.id = #{id} order by role.sort

select resource.id, resource.app_id, resource.`code`, resource.p_id, resource.resource_name, resource.url, resource.permission, resource.type, resource.sort from uim_sys_user sysuser left join uim_user_role userrole on userrole.user_id = sysuser.id left join uim_role role on role.id = userrole.role_id LEFT JOIN uim_role_resource roleresource on roleresource.role_id = role.id LEFT JOIN uim_resource resource on resource.id = roleresource.resource_id where sysuser.id = #{id} ORDER BY resource.sort
